pageContext.claim: “Ratings for NFL football are way down except before game starts, when people tune in to see whether or not our country will be disrespected!”
pageContext.analysis: This lacks context. The TV audience size for NFL games is down this year, but it’s unclear exactly why, and there is no direct connection to the protests. “Average attendance at regular season NFL games last year was the highest since 2007, when the NFL set an all-time record in attendance. The NFL says ticket sales are “on par” with last year,” according to the Associated Press. And professional football games remain among the most-watched televised events, the AP reported.
